Abstrak: An essay is presented that discusses fabrication techniques used in artist Pablo Picasso's cubist art in relation to the notion of objects in time. Topics include techniques used by Picasso to attach paper together using pins and paste as in his artworks "Guitar" (two separate works) and "Man with a Hat," the notion of papiers collés in Picasso's work, and Picasso's use of photography.
Sumber: Grey Room. Winter2015, Issue 58, p26-49. 24p. 1 Color Photograph, 8 Black and White Photographs
